problem:
set_option linter.unusedVariables false

-- 定义 Tree 数据类型
inductive Tree : Type
| leaf : Tree
| node (l : Tree) (v : Int) (r : Tree) : Tree

open Tree

-- 定义 tree_example2a
def treeExample2a : Tree :=
  node (node leaf 8 leaf) 100 (node leaf 9 leaf)

-- 定义 tree_example2b
def treeExample2b : Tree :=
  node (node leaf 9 leaf) 100 (node leaf 8 leaf)

-- 定义 tree_example3a
def treeExample3a : Tree :=
  node (node leaf 3 leaf) 5 treeExample2a

-- 定义 tree_example3b
def treeExample3b : Tree :=
  node treeExample2b 5 (node leaf 3 leaf)

-- 定义 tree_reverse 函数
def treeReverse : Tree → Tree
| leaf => leaf
| node l v r => node (treeReverse r) v (treeReverse l)

-- 定义一个例子
theorem treeExample3TreeReverse : treeReverse treeExample3a = treeExample3b := by
